Title: Very nice restaurant
Author: Chris B
Review text: We heard good comments of the Other local.  Gave it a try not disappointed. Friendly staff great grub. Parking can be tricky though

Title: Birthday celebrations
Author: pirie2325
Review text: 13 of us went to celebrate a birthday, we had a room to ourselves. The owner and staff very welcoming and couldn’t do enough for us especially Mel, great service. The food was all excellent very tasty and plenty of it . Highly recommend a visit. Thank you for a wonderful evening.

Title: First time  visit
Author: Mlr
Review text: Wow the steak was the best ever , late Xmas meal for 5 of us and what a treat , well worth the money , great atmosphere if your looking to spoil yourself and not pay over the odds this is definitely the place to come .

Title: Faultless would highly recommend
Author: florenceGrimsby
Review text: Absolutely superb meal.  Started with Greek platter which is meant for two to share.  We shared between three and there was plenty.  Salad, olives, beautiful feta and fried halloumi with dips and pitta, all really lovely.  Everyone said their main courses were lovely, including the best fillet steak one of our party said he’d ever had.  None of us could manage a pudding.  Service was excellent.  Will definitely be back
